fields.label: Name of the facility for Schema

fields.label: Specific Type of Place (@type; additionalType)
fields.name: facility_place_subtype
fields.instructions: Select the most specific type of place that matches this facility. If there is no match, then select "None."

choices.0: None — No available option is relevant to this organization
choices.Wikidata_Building_Q41176: Building (specific Facility) — structure, typically with a roof and walls, standing more or less permanently in one place (https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q41176)
choices.Wikidata_BuildingComplex_Q1497364: Building Complex (specific Facility) — set of related buildings (https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q1497364)
choices.SchemaOrg_CityHall_Q25550691: City Hall (specific Government Building) — A city hall (https://schema.org/CityHall; https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q25550691)

choices.Wikidata_CommercialBuilding: Commercial Building (specific Building) — buildings associated with any aspect of the various activities and business relationships of industry and trade (https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q655686)
choices.Wikidata_EducationalComplex_Q20860083: Educational Complex (specific Institutional Complex) — group of educational buildings (https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q20860083)
choices.SchemaOrg_EventVenue: Event Venue (specific Civic Structure) — An event venue (https://schema.org/EventVenue; https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q18674739)
choices.Wikidata_Facility_Q13226383: Facility — structure, typically with a roof and walls, standing more or less permanently in one place (https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q13226383)
choices.SchemaOrg_GovernmentBuilding: Government Building (specific Civic Structure) — A government building (https://schema.org/GovernmentBuilding; https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q16831714)
choices.SchemaOrg_LandmarksOrHistoricalBuildings: Historical Landmark / Historical Building — An historical landmark or building (https://schema.org/LandmarksOrHistoricalBuildings; https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q51369558)
choices.SchemaOrg_Hospital: Hospital (specific Civic Structure; specific Medical Facility) — A hospital (https://schema.org/Hospital; https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q16917)
choices.Wikidata_InstitutionalComplex_Q19691007: Institutional Complex (specific Building Complex) — group of many institutional buildings (https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q19691007)
choices.SchemaOrg_LegislativeBuilding: Legislative Building (specific Government Building) — A legislative building (e.g., the state capitol) (https://schema.org/LegislativeBuilding)
choices.Wikidata_MedicalFacility_Q4260475: Medical Facility (specific Facility) — any location at which medicine is practiced regularly (https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q4260475)
choices.SchemaOrg_PerformingArtsTheater: Performing Arts Theater (specific Civic Structure) — A theater or other performing art center (https://schema.org/PerformingArtsTheater; https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q24354)
choices.Wikidata_RetailBuilding_Q18760388: Retail Building (specific Commercial Building) — building housing businesses engaged in the sale of consumer goods or services (https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q18760388)
choices.Wikidata_ShoppingCenter_Q11315: Shopping Center (specific Retail Building) — complex of shops (https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q11315)
choices.SchemaOrg_StadiumOrArena: Stadium or Arena (specific Civic Structure) — A stadium (https://schema.org/StadiumOrArena; https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q483110)
choices.Wikidata_UniversityBuilding_Q19844914: University Building (specific Building) — building used by a higher education institution (https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q19844914)
choices.Wikidata_UniversityCampus_Q30785519: University Campus (specific Educational Complex) — ensemble of university buildings and adjacent open spaces (https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q30785519)

fields.name: facility_google_cid_query

fields.label: Primary Brand Organization for This Location
fields.name: facility_brandorg_query

fields.label: Street Address
fields.name: facility_streetaddress
fields.instructions:
Spell out numbered streets nine and under; use figures for 10 and above (e.g., 5 Sixth Ave., 3012 50th St., No. 10 Downing St.).

Use the abbreviations Ave., Blvd. and St. Otherwise, spell out similar words (e.g., Alley, Drive, Road, Terrace).

Always use figures for an address number (e.g., 9 Morningside Circle).

Spell out and capitalize First through Ninth when used as street names; use figures for 10th and above (e.g., 7 Fifth Ave., 100 21st St.).

Abbreviate compass points used to indicate directional ends of a street or quadrants of a city in a numbered address (e.g., 222 E. 42nd St., 562 W. 43rd St., 600 K St. NW). Do not use periods in quadrant abbreviations (e.g., NW, SE).

Use these forms, as appropriate in the context, for highways identified by number: U.S. Highway 67, Arkansas Highway 10, Interstate 630.

When a letter is appended to a number, capitalize it but do not use a hyphen (e.g., U.S. Highway 71B).

fields.label: ZIP Code
fields.name: facility_zip
fields.instructions: Find the ZIP+4 Code for an address at https://tools.usps.com/zip-code-lookup.htm?byaddress.

fields.label: Arkansas Region
fields.name: facility_region
fields.instructions: For information on how the Arkansas regions are defined, visit https://communications.uams.edu/web/kb/location-regions/.

fields.label: GPS Location of the Main facility Entrance
fields.name: facility_map

fields.label: GPS Location of the Main Parking Area for the facility
fields.name: facility_parking_map
fields.instructions:
If the parking area is a parking deck, place the pin on the entrance to the parking deck from the street.

If the parking area is a surface-level parking lot, place the pin in the middle of the parking lot.

fields.label: General Parking Instructions for the facility
fields.name: facility_parking_instructions
fields.instructions:
Indicate whether patients will park in a parking deck or surface-level parking.

Indicate which parking lot, parking deck or other area in which patients will park when coming to this location.

Indicate whether or not patients will have to pay for parking.

If there is a parking fee for patients, indicate whether locations in this facility typically validate parking.

If patients will be parking in a specific parking deck, indicate the ideal area of the parking deck in which patients should park for most locations within this facility. If there is a patient drop-off area, also include details about that.

fields.label: Photo of the facility Exterior
fields.name: facility_photo
fields.instructions:
Select an image that will help the patient find the appropriate facility from the road.

The photo orientation must be landscape / horizontal.

It is restricted to a 16:9 aspect ratio (or close to it) and has a minimum dimension of 1200x675.

The image will be automatically cropped to a 16:9 aspect ratio when used on the site; 1.91:1 aspect ratio when sharing to Facebook and Twitter.
